Travelytix is creating a SaaS product (GuestFriend) for hoteliers to more effectively cater to guestsâ€™ preferences by creating new channels for collecting user-generated data. We will help clients analyze their data to increase profitability via up-sells and personalization.

We're a three person team working out of a gorgeous penthouse in downtown Brooklyn, less than minutes form every major subway. We're looking for people excited to make a big impact and iterate quickly.
